name: Korsoth Vastikan
skills: Acrobatics +7, Deception +4, Investigation +3, Perception +4, Stealth +7, Survival +4

traits.name: Everchanging Changers
traits.desc: The Court of All Flesh are beings of pure chaos. Because their minds are pure disorder, they cannot be driven mad or charmed and any attempts to magically compel their behavior fails.

traits.name: Formless Shape
traits.desc: Vastikan is immune to any spell or effect that would alter his form.

traits.name: Formkiller
traits.desc: If Vastikan hits a target with three or more arrows in one round, the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or lose its native form. Roll on the Reincarnation table to determine the target’s new form. The target reverts to its original form after 1 hour. A target that succeeds on its saving throw becomes immune to Formkiller for 24 hours.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
